name: RocketChat Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 RocketChat Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume RocketChat API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume RocketChat API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: chat
available_options: Chat (值: chat)
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: postMessage
available_options: Post Message (值: postMessage) - Post a message to a channel or a direct message
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

channel.name: channel
channel.description: The channel name with the prefix in front of it
channel.natural_language_description: 参数名: Channel | 作用: The channel name with the prefix in front of it | (必填项)

text.name: text
text.description: The text of the message to send, is optional because of attachments
text.natural_language_description: 参数名: Text | 作用: The text of the message to send, is optional because of attachments

jsonParameters.name: jsonParameters
jsonParameters.natural_language_description: 参数名: JSON Parameters | 默认值: False

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: alias (值: None) - This will cause the message’s name to appear as the given alias, but your username will still display
avatar (值: None) - If provided, this will make the avatar use the provided image URL
emoji (值: None) - This will cause the message’s name to appear as the given alias, but your username will still display

attachments.name: attachments
attachments.natural_language_description: 参数名: Attachments | 默认值: {}
available_options: color (值: None) - The color you want the order on the left side to be, any value background-css supports
text (值: None) - The text to display for this attachment, it is different than the message’s text
ts (值: None) - Displays the time next to the text portion
thumbUrl (值: None) - An image that displays to the left of the text, looks better when this is relatively small
messageLink (值: None) - Only applicable if the timestamp is provided, as it makes the time clickable to this link
collapsed (值: None) - Causes the image, audio, and video sections to be hiding when collapsed is true
authorName (值: None) - Name of the author
authorLink (值: None) - Providing this makes the author name clickable and points to this link
authorIcon (值: None) - Displays a tiny icon to the left of the Author’s name
title (值: None) - Title to display for this attachment, displays under the author
titleLink (值: None) - Providing this makes the title clickable, pointing to this link
titleLinkDownload (值: None) - When this is true, a download icon appears and clicking this saves the link to file
imageUrl (值: None) - The image to display, will be “big” and easy to see
audioUrl (值: None) - Audio file to play, only supports what html audio does
videoUrl (值: None) - Video file to play, only supports what html video does
fields (值: None)
